invention-title.$: COMBINATIONS OF A MUSCARINIC RECEPTOR ANTAGONIST AND A BETA-2 ADRENORECEPTOR AGONIST

p.$: Abstract Novel combinations of a muscarinic acetylcholine receptor antagonist and a beta 2 agonist for inhaled administration via the nose or mouth, and methods of using them are provided.
